e2.title: Welcome Home, Good Hunter...
e2.message:
Eight legendary trick weapons have been
added to Ashes with full functionality, feints,
and movesets! Keep your eyes out for the
next trick weapon coming soon...

e1.title: Review: First Tournament
e1.message:
Thanks to all who attended our first King 
of the Keep event and the $150 Finals!
If you missed it, you can check out a recap of
the events on Youtube.
